text: Læa hakwa brrda phu xthrrm mi sing thi mi xyu nı phændin ni thanghmd læa mi yeiyng nan xik dwy nænxn phwk khea ca khx thi dwy sing nan hı phn cak kar lngthosʹ thi chaw ray nı wan ki ya mahˌ tæ sing thi phwk khea mi khey khad khid ma kxn ley wa sing thima ca kxallxhˌ nan ca prakt khun kæ phwk khea
